title: IndyCar race coming to Washington DC
shortDescription: The IndyCar race is part of President Trump’s plans to celebrate the country’s 250th birthday.

title: Trump unveils plans for ‘Independence Arch’ to mark America’s 250th
shortDescription: Trump unveiled plans for an ‘Independent Arch’ near Arlington Cemetery to mark America’s 250th anniversary on July 4, 2026. (Scripps News)

title: Trump files lawsuit against IRS, Treasury
shortDescription: President Trump and his sons filed a $10 billion lawsuit against the IRS and Treasury Department for leaking tax returns to 'leftist newspapers.'

title: How tall is Melania Trump? Donald Trump's family stands tall in movie
shortDescription: First lady Melania Trump has a new documentary out, sure to feature others in President Donald Trump's family. How tall are they, including son Barron?

title: Trump threatens tariffs on Cuba oil supply
shortDescription: Trump warned Cuba to reach an agreement with the U.S. after signing an executive order to impose tariffs on countries that supply the island with oil.

title: Will government shut down? GOP infighting puts brakes on deal
shortDescription: Trump and Senate Democrats reached a compromise to fund the government, but it was unclear if it would pass Congress in time to avoid a shutdown.

title: Florida bans nurse for TikTok post about Trump's press secretary
shortDescription: A nurse is banned from working in Florida following an expletive-filled social media post wishing President Trump’s press secretary a painful child birth.

title: 'I'm an immigrant.' Melania Trump talks role, legacy at movie premiere
shortDescription: The first lady celebrated the world premiere of "Melania" and told USA TODAY that she's "proud to be an American citizen."

title: Mike Johnson says government will 'inevitably' face short shut down
shortDescription: House Speaker Mike Johnson said that "logistics" for House members may force the federal government into a brief shutdown, despite a funding deal made in the Senate.

title: Trump to announce Federal Reserve Chair pick
shortDescription: President Donald Trump says he plans to announce his pick for Federal Reserve Chair to replace Jerome Powell on Friday.

title: President Trump sues IRS, Treasury for $10 billion over tax return leak
shortDescription: Charles "Chaz" Littlejohn, a former IRS employee, is currently serving a five-year sentence in prison for disclosing thousands of tax returns.

title: Senate reaches DHS funding deal as shutdown looms
shortDescription: The Senate reached a deal to fund DHS for two weeks as lawmakers rush to pass a spending package by Friday to avoid a partial government shutdown.

title: What to watch amid immigration standoff between Trump, Democrats
shortDescription: Shutdowns are politically risky but Democrats feel changing winds on immigration enforcement as White House walks a new tightrope.
